outputs.output_descr:
The Electoral Support Project (ESP) is a technical assistance initiative, commencing upon the completion of the CA elections in 2008 and covering support to upcoming set of elections. ESP has a strong emphasis on building a sustainable and enduring institutional and professional capacity within the Election Commission of Nepal (ECN) that could be easily and effectively deployed in the future elections. There are three major areas of focus of the Project:
1. Instituional stregthening and professional development of ECN
2. Operational and logistic support throughout the electoral cycle
3. Democratic participation, particulalrly of under-represented and disadvantaged segments of the Nepali society.

project_descr: Institutional Strengthening and Professional Development Support for the Election Commission of Nepal
